name: Saying Hello
description: Greets user with a message by prompting them to enter their name in this program.

name: Counting the Number of Characters
description: Input a string, and this program will count the number of characters in the string, giving you an accurate character count.

name: Printing Quotes
description: With this program, enter your favorite quote and author name to display an inspiring quote.

name: Mad Lib
description: Input a noun, verb, adverb, and adjective to insert into a story and create a hilarious mad lib.

name: Simple Math
description: Prompt the user to input two numbers and this program will display various operation with the two numbers.

name: Retirement Calculator
description: Find out how long you have until retirement with this program. Based on your age and retirement age input, it will calculate the year you can retire.

name: Area of a Rectangular Room
description: This program allows you to calculate the area of a rectangular room by inputting the length and width in feet, and it will provide you with the area in both square feet and square meters.

name: Pizza Party
description: Calculate the number of slices of pizza each person at a party can have, based on the number of people, pizzas, and slices per pizza.

name: Paint Calculator
description: Input the length and width of a room, as well as the number of coats you plan to apply, and this program will calculate the amount of paint you need to purchase.

name: Self-Checkout
description: A program that calculates the subtotal, tax, and total of a shopping cart for multiple items, with each item having its own price and quantity input.

name: Currency Conversion
description: This program allows you to convert an amount of money from one currency to another.

name: Computing Simple Interest
description: Input the amount of principal, the rate of interest, and the number of years, and this program will calculate the simple interest, total amount, and total interest.

name: Determining Compound Interest
description: This program allows you to calculate the compound interest earned over a specific number of years, given the initial principal, interest rate, and compounding frequency.

name: Tax Calculator
description: Input the order amount and the state where the order is shipped, and this program will calculate the total cost, including tax, for the order.

name: Password Validation
description: Prompt the user to input a password, and this program will validate it based on certain criteria, such as length, the inclusion of special characters, and more.

name: Legal Driving Age
description: Determines whether a user is old enough to legally drive based on their age.

name: Blood Alcohol Calculator
description: Calculates a user's blood alcohol content (BAC) based on gender, weight, hours, and number of drinks.

name: Temperature Converter
description: a program that converts temperatures between Kelvin, Celsius, and Fahrenheit.

name: BMI Calculator
description: Calculates a user's Body Mass Index (BMI) based on their height and weight.

name: Multistate Sales Tax Calculator
description: Calculates the total sales tax for a purchase in a state, given the state's tax rate and the county's tax rate.

name: Numbers to Names
description: A program that prompts for a number from 1 to 12 and displays the corresponding month name.

name: Comparing Numbers
description: Compares two numbers and determines which one is larger, or if they are equal.

name: Troubleshooting Car Issues
description: A program that asks a series of questions to determine the cause of a car issue.

name: Anagram Checker
description: Checks whether two user-entered strings are anagrams (contain the same characters in a different order).

name: Password Strength Indicator
description: Generates a random password and rates its strength based on length and characters used.

name: Credit Card Payment Calculator
description: Calculates the monthly payment for a credit card based on the balance, APR, and monthly payment.

name: Validating Inputs
description: A program that asks for your name and makes sure you don't try any funny business with invalid characters or input. Then greet you with a friendly message!

name: Adding Numbers
description: Prompts you numbers and adds them as you keep inputting them.

name: Handling Bad Input
description: Prompt the user for their name, and if the input is empty, display an error message. Otherwise, greet the user using their name.

name: Multiplication Table
description: a program that prompts the user for an integer, and then display a multiplication table for that integer from 1-12.

name: Karvonen Heart Rate
description: The user is asked for their age and resting heart rate, and then display heart rate ranges for different intensities according to the Karvonen formula.

name: Guess the Number Game
description: Generate a random number, and prompt the user for their guess. Continuously display feedback to the user until the correct guess is made.

name: Magic 8 Ball
description: Prompt the user for a yes-or-no question, and then display a randomly selected answer from a pre-defined set of possible answers, like a real Magic 8 Ball.

name: Employee List Removal
description: Create a list of employees, and prompt the user for a name to remove. Remove the name and display the updated list of employees.

name: Picking a Winner
description: Create a list of names, randomly select a winner, and display the name of the lucky person. It's like drawing a winner from a hat, but with code!

name: Computing Statistics
description: Asks user for a list of numbers, and then displays the average, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation of those numbers.

name: Password Generator
description: Asks user for number of characters, special characters, and numbers, and then generates a random password for the user.

name: Filtering Values
description: Prompts for a list of numbers, and then prints out only the filtered numbers.

name: Sorting Records
description: A program that sorts a list of employees by last name, position, and separation date.

name: Filtering Records
description: A program that prompts for a search string and then displays all records that contain the search string.

name: Name Sorter
description: Prints a list of names in alphabetical order from a file.

name: Parsing a Data File
description: A program that parses a csv file and prints the data in a table format.

name: Website Generator
description: Prompts the user for information about a website, and then generates an index.html file for the site.

name: Product Search
description: A program that prompts for a product name and then retrieves the current price and quantity for that product.

name: Word Finder
description: Search through a file and find all occurrences of a word or phrase and replace it with another word or phrase

name: Word Frequency Finder
description: Create a histogram displaying the word frequencies in a given file.

name: Who's in Space?
description: A program connects to the NASA API and returns the names of people who are currently in space.

name: Grabbing the Weather
description: A program that prompts for a city name and returns the current weather for that city.

name: Flickr Photo Search
description: A program that prompts for a search term and then displays the first 5 photos matching that term.

name: Movie Recommendations
description: A program that prompts for a movie title and then displays the movie's information and a list of recommended movies.

name: Pushing Notes to Firebase
description: A program that prompts for a note title and note text, and then saves the note to Firebase.

name: Creating Your Own Time Service
description: Creates a web service that returns the current time in a JSON format. A client program then consumes the JSON data and displays the time.

name: Todo List
description: App that prompts for a task and then stores it in a list. The user can enter tasks repeatedly, and the list is displayed each time the user enters a task.

name: URL Shortener
description: A program that prompts for a URL and then creates a shortened URL.

name: Text Sharing
description: This app allows users to share text snippets with each other. Users can create a unique URL for each snippet, and then share that URL with others. When a user visits the URL, they'll see the text snippet.

name: Tracking Inventory
description: A program that tracks an inventory of products stored in a JSON. Will print out in HTML and CSV formats.

name: Trivia App
description: A multiple choice trivia game that reads a question and multiple answers, and then the user selects the correct answer.

name: Exercise Not Found
description: 404 You have strayed, This exercise doesn't exist!
